SELECT
from saas_collection_order
and order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and deleted = 0

select sco.order_no orderNo,sbri.name,sb.mobile,sbri.gender, sbri.identity_code identityCode,so.real_capital realCapital, datediff(so.repayment_dt,so.created_dt) applyDays, so.channel_code channelCode ,sc.channel_name channelName from saas_collection_order sco left join saas_order so on sco.order_no=so.order_numb left join saas_borrower sb on so.borrower_code=sb.borrower_code left join saas_borrower_real_info sbri on so.borrower_code=sbri.borrower_code left join saas_channel sc on so.channel_code=sc.channel_code

select count(*) from saas_collection_order sco left join saas_order so on sco.order_no=so.order_numb left join saas_borrower sb on so.borrower_code=sb.borrower_code left join saas_borrower_real_info sbri on so.borrower_code=sbri.borrower_code left join saas_channel sc on so.channel_code=sc.channel_code
